boat.full_description:
Described by the West Solent Boat builders in a for sale notice sometime after August 1980:

Reputedly designed by Morgan Giles for a retired army officer.

Her swan stern is typical of this period and is of great advantage in a following sea provided the stern has not been us ed to carry heavy stores.

Her almost brand new diesel engine drives her at 6 knots and consumes approximately one gallon per hour.

The owner has crossed the channel very comfortably in heavy weather using jib, staysail and mizzen while stowing the m ainsail.
boat.name: Pintail
